welcome content: Our laboratory's data server, named Miracle, is a versatile platform dedicated to providing diverse medical data download, visualization, and general processing services. Designed to meet the needs of researchers and professionals in the medical field, Miracle offers a user-friendly interface and a robust set of features for seamless data exploration and utilization.
translate for us: If there are anything wrong in translation, please inform us in github!
login.password.validate.error.length: The password must contain at least 8 characters
login.password.validate.error.uppercase: The password must contain uppercase letters
login.password.validate.error.lowercase: The password must contain lowercase letters
login.repeatPassword.validate: The confirmed password must be the same as the password
login.error.empty: Please enter your account and password
login.title.sign-up: Don't have an account? Click here to sign up
user.name: Name/Nickname
signup.error.incorrect-item: There are still incomplete items that do not meet the requirements. Please complete them according to the error message.
signup.repeat-email: This email has already been registered
signup.process.wait-retry: The registration process for this username is in progress. Please try again later.
bm.meta-data.description: Used to modify and add basic description information of datasets
mdata.meta-info.name: Dataset name
mdata.meta-info.task_ids: Algorithm tasks applicable to the dataset
mdata.meta-info.modality_ids: Data modalities included in the dataset
mdata.meta-info.data_num: Volume of data in the dataset
mdata.meta-info.label_num: Number of labels in the dataset
mdata.meta-info.split_info.label: Label count
bm.confirm.content: Your action will delete the metadata of the current dataset. Are you sure?
bm.confirm.title: Warning
